Package mealplanner

Class MealPlanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • mealplanner.MealPlanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    class MealPlanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    MealPlanner handles the backend logic for MealPlannerGui. In abstract terms, a Meal Planner allows the user to create a plan for what they are going to eat for each meal in a week and provides nutritional information correspondingly.

    • Field Detail

      • serialVersionUID

        private static final long serialVersionUID
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • mealList

        private transient java.util.ArrayList<Meal> mealList
        A fixed list of possible meals that the User can select from, sorted by the BLD category. The list is read in from a file and parsed to create the meal objects.
        See Also:
        Meal.BLD, Meal

      • currentPlans

        private java.util.ArrayList<MealPlan> currentPlans
        An ArrayList of the Meal Plans that the user has created. In "simple" terms this is a list of lists of lists of meals.
        See Also:
        MealPlan

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        The user provided name of the account.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MealPlanner

        public MealPlanner​(java.lang.String name)
        Constructor for MealPlanner. mealList is created using the createMealList method. name is initialized to specified name. currentPlans is initialized to a default ArrayList.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the account
